message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in this product but my budget is $15000. I'd be willing to close the deal right now if you're open to that price.

I understand that $15000 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $18000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $18000 is still a bit out of my price range. Would you be open to $16500? I'm confident we can find a solution that works for both of us.

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob! I can see you're serious about this product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $17000. It's a fair price, considering the value this product will bring to your business.

Alice,  I truly appreciate your flexibility.  While $17000 is tempting, I'm still a bit stretched. Would you consider $16000 as a final offer? I believe this is a fair price considering the value we both see in this product.

I can see you're really trying to make this work, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll meet you at $16500, which is my absolute minimum. If you're still interested, let's finalize the deal.
